attributes.action: Raise the minimum wage for 16 year olds who work just as hard as 18's
attributes.background: People who work just as hard as 18+ should be entitled to a fair wage as they are doing the same work, sometimes working harder.

rejection.details:
We don't know what you want the minimum wage for 16 year olds to be. We think you might want the same action as this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/129317
